title: Die Veneris 11 Junii 1647. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that all such officers or souldiers of the army, as shall come off and conforme to the votes sent downe to the army, shall receive the benefit and advantage of those votes.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in ..,
notes: Includes: Die Veneris 11 Junii. 1647. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that the summe of ten thousand pounds be paid upon accompt by Alderman Bunce, ...
Two votes relative to the disbanding of the army. Cf. Steele.
Both signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
